pr_title: Add initial secret manager property source implementation

timeline.message: Add Secret Manager as bootstrap property source

timeline.bodyText:
In general, what we've been recommending to integrators downstream is the following transformation:
:pid/:sid => projects/:pid/secrets/:sid/versions/latest
:pid/:sid/:vid => projects/:pid/secrets/:sid/versions/:vid
projects/:pid/secrets/:sid => projects/:pid/secrets/:sid/versions/latest
projects/:pid/secrets/:sid/versions/:vid => projects/:pid/secrets/:sid/versions/:vid

That way, the result of the parsing is always a fully-qualified secret version reference which you can pass directly to AccessSecretVersion without needing to complicate that method.
